reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, with one mentioning the hearts on the elbows as a beautiful reminder to stay true to oneself, and appreciate its great quality, comfort, and softness. The material is nice, and they like that it's not too heavy, with one describing it as a fashionable lightweight piece. While many find it true to size, some mention it runs a little small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just a sweater--- it's a statement. ♡
items.body: As someone who truly believes in wearing their heart on their sleeve, finding a piece of clothing that reflects this philosophy in such a stylish and cozy way has been a revelation. The Women's Heart on Sleeve Sweater is not just a sweater—it's a statement. Life isn't always easy, and in a world that can often be harsh and unkind, expressing kindness, love, and openness is more important than ever. This sweater embodies that sentiment perfectly. The heart detail on the sleeve is a beautiful reminder to stay true to oneself and to lead with compassion and empathy, no matter the circumstances. The quality of the sweater is fantastic. The fabric is soft and comforting, like a warm hug on a chilly day. It fits wonderfully, offering a flattering shape without compromising on comfort. I appreciate the thoughtfulness in its design, balancing both style and substance. Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cute
items.body: Fantastic, cute and great material. Read more
items.author: Brandy Case

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy
items.body: Super cute and comfy sweater. The red elbow patches don't bleed. The sleeves are just a bit short. Typically wears a size small and the small was perfect (not snug) - 5'6 and 140lbs. Read more
items.author: em_domi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely
items.body: This sweater is beautiful. Well made, soft and true to size. Great value for the money. I highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Sandra S. Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and great quality.
items.body: Super cute and great quality. The hearts on the sleeves are adorable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater, but…
items.body: I love the look, the fit and the fact that it was heavy/thick enough to be warm but not too heavy. I was looking forward to wearing for Valentine’s Day… Downside, the very first time I went to wear this sweater out….I got confronted that I had a hole in the side that was big enough that my bra could be seen. By the time I went to the bathroom to check, the whole right seam had come unraveled—armpit to waist cinch. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: The best quality- very comfortable!! Love this- will order another one Read more
items.author: Kyle and Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heart sweater
items.body: So soft! Good quality! Read more
items.author: Greg Lavergne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B 10244 Navy Stripes, E 999 White&black Stripes, B 10244 Pink Stripes, B 10244 Camel Stripes, F Green, F Red, D 998 Blue&white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
